settings.text: We're delighted to invite you for an exclusive online styling appointment.

settings.grid-right-content-01:
Book your free 30-minute online styling session with one of our store assistants. 

The consultation will include styling advice, size guidance and product recommendations with the ability to place an order instantly. All you need is a phone/iPad or your laptop to make an appointment. It is easy to book, simply pick a date and a time, and we will do the rest. 

Once your booking is confirmed, you will be sent a link to connect with one of our sales assistants. 

During the appointment our in-store stylist will pre-prepare an edit based on your preferences.

If you wish to purchase any of the items during the appointment, you can make a payment directly online. You will then receive an order confirmation email and any follow up communication from us. 

*Please note that at the moment we are able to process online orders through the app for the UK only, but if you are outside the UK and you’d like styling advice and assistance with your purchase, we’ll be happy to help! We are working on setting up the online appointments for customers outside the UK.

If you have any questions about the online styling service please contact our customer care team. 

Call:  +44 (0) 207 0164312

Email: info@chintiandparker.com
